Function reference

Derivations for Adding Parameters/Records

ADFACE-specific

Parameter Derivation Functions helpful for building the ADFACE datasets

derive_diam_to_sev_records()
Creating Severity Records From Diameter
derive_fever_records()
Creating Fever Records

Derivations for Adding Variables

Functions used for deriving new variables

derive_var_aval_adis()
Derive AVAL variable for ADIS ADaM domain
derive_vars_crit()
Derive Analysis Criterion Evaluation Variables
derive_vars_event_flag()
Adds Flag Variables for an Occurred Event .
derive_vars_max_flag()
Creating ANLxxFL Variables To Flag The Maximum Records
derive_vars_merged_vaccine()
Add New Variable(s) to the Input dataset Based on Variables from Another dataset
derive_vars_params()
Assigning Parameter Variables
derive_vars_vaxdt()
Add Vaccination Date Variables to the Output Dataset

Helper Utilities

Utilities used within Derivation functions

max_flag()
Creating Maximum Flag

Other Advanced Functions

ADFACE-specific

post_process_reacto()
Post processing function for ADFACE dataset

Example Datasets

You can run admiral::use_ad_template() to produce additional datasets

vx_adsl
Subject Level Analysis - Vaccine Specific
vx_ce
Clinical Events
vx_dm
Demographics
vx_ex
Exposure
vx_face
Findings About Clinical Events
vx_is
Immunogenicity Specimen
vx_suppce
Supplemental Clinical Events
vx_suppdm
Supplemental Demographics
vx_suppex
Supplemental Exposure A SDTM Supplementary EX dataset
vx_suppface
Supplemental Findings About Clinical Events
vx_suppis
Supplemental Immunogenicity Specimen
vx_vs
Vital Signs
